choices: Mathew, a 20 year-old male college student.
Melanie, a 20 year-old female college student
1.content: Before the story begins you must choose your character.
1.title: Who are you?

choices: Friend offers you a new drug that came out
Say no and doesnt take the drug
Says yes and takes the drug
Goes home and start to wet the bed
11.title: Mathew, a 20 year-old male college student.

12.content:
"I can't do this." you complain, closing your textbook. "It just isn't sinking in."

"Maybe you should try J." Kelly suggest.

"J?" you ask.

"Juvenile." she explains. "It's this new drug. It makes your mind younger."

"How will that help me study?" you ask.

"Your mind was better at learning when you were you were younger." She says. "Children are like sponges for information."

"Have you tried it?" you ask.

"Yeah." she reaches into her bag. "It got me through the last exam." She pulls out a plastic zip-lock bag containing a number of white tablets. "Want to try it?"
12.title: Melanie, a 20 year-old female college student

121.content:
"Okay." you're desperate. "I'll try it."

"Right now?" she asks. "In the library?"
121.title: Try it.

1211.content:
"Sure." you say. "Why not?"

"We've got a lecture in an hour." Kelly reminds you.

"So?" you asks. "You just said it helps you learn."

"Fine." she says. "How many do you want? I usually take 1. That makes me effectively 15 for about 3 hours, which is about as long as I could focus when I was 15 anyway."

"I don't think I could focus at all when I was 15." you admit. "Except when it came to boys."

"You could try younger." she says with a giggle. "Maybe before puberty."

"How many pills will that take?" you ask.

"I don't know." she says. "I've never gone that young and the does required changes from person to person anyway."
1211.title: Say yes.

choices: Ask Kelly to take you to the potty.
Ignore the need to use the potty.
12112.content:
"Give me two." you device.

"Okay." Kelly takes two pills from the bag before putting it away. "Here you go."

You swallow both at the same time and wait. "Nothing's happening."

"Give it a moment." she says.

You feel odd for a moment, like you don't belong in your own body, but the feeling passes.

"I bored." you say. On some level you recognise that your grammar isn't perfect but it doesn't seem important. What is important is that you don't want to be sitting in this boring library looking at books without pictures. "Wanna play."

"Oh dear." Kelly looks concerned. "I think you took too much."

"Wanna play." you repeat, louder. This makes other people look at you and Kelly. They don't look happy.

"Okay. I'll take you to play." Kelly packs up the books into her backpack and your own before leading you out of the library.

As you get into the lifts you realise that you need to use the potty.
12112.title: Take 2 tablets.

choices: Tell her you had an accident.
121122.content:
There's no time for potty. You're going out to play.

Kelly leads you away from the library. She takes you to her car.

You climb into the back seat. This causes Kelly to give you an odd look. She is about to get into the driver's when she notices that your seat-belt isn't fastened. She walks around to your door and pulls the strap across you, clicking it into place.

She finally returns to her seat and starts the car. By now you really need to go potty.

"Where are we going?" you ask.

"We're going to my house." she tells you.

"But I wanna play." you insist. Your little tantrum makes you forget about holding on and you begin to wet your pants.

Kelly notices the abrupt end to you complaints and asks. "Melanie? Are you okay?"
121122.title: Ignore the need to use the potty.

1211221.content:
"I had a accident." you say childishly.

"You what." It takes Kelly a moment to realise what you mean. "You wet yourself?"

"Yeah." you say, embarrassed.

Kelly pulls into a car park. "Wait here." she tells you, leaving the car.
1211221.title: Tell her you had an accident.

12112211.content:
You want to be a good girl so you wait in your seat. Kelly isn't gone long. She returns carrying a shopping bag which she places in the front passenger seat.

"What's that?" you ask as she starts the car again.

"Just something in case you have any more accidents." She explains.

You don't question her any further.

Once at her apartment she unclips your seat-belt and leads you inside. "You should have a shower." she tells you opening the door to her bathroom.

She turns on the shower and helps you undress. "In you get." she says, taking your wet clothes.

You don't really wash yourself under the shower. Instead you play and splash around in the water. Fortunately that's enough to rinse the pee off.

When Kelly returns you are sitting on the floor of the shower, blocking the drain with your hands so that the bottom of the shower fills with water.

"I think that's enough." she turns off the shower and picks up a towel for you.

"Aww" you complain as she wraps you in the towel and dries you.

"Come on." she leads you from the bathroom into her bedroom. The shopping bag is sitting on the bed. From it she pulls out a package.

It takes you a moment to realise what's about to happen. "Diapers? But I'm a big girl."

"I know Melanie." she says. "But if you have another accident these will keep your clothes dry." She tears open the package and pulls out a diaper. Unfolding it on the bed she requests "Please lay down so I can get your dressed."
12112211.title: Do as you are told.

121122111.content:
You reluctantly lay down on Kelly's bed.

"Good girl" she says, sliding the plastic diaper under your naked bottom. You smile at the praise as she pulls the front of the diaper up tight between your legs and fastens the tapes. "There, no more accidents."

She dresses you in a skirt and t-shirt from her wardrobe and declares. "Okay. homework time."

"No." you say. "I don't want to do homework."

"If you are a good girl I'll take you to see a movie." she promises.
121122111.title: Lay down.

1211221111.content:
"Okay." you agree, following her to the dining table where books are spread out. She puts one in front of you and tells you to read it.

You do as you are told and start reading. You aren't sure what it all means but you want to be a good girl so you keep reading.

Soon you feel the need to use the toilet again.
1211221111.title: Do your homework.

12112211111.content: You start wetting as soon as you feel the need to peebut you continued to study untile it was time for class.
12112211111.title: Wet the diaper.

choices: ...lets you do whatever you want. She doesn't care anymore.
...pulls down your diaper, lifts over her knees and spank you.
1211221112.content:
The thought of doing homework fills with boredom; you wanted to watch cartoons and play instead of doing some stupid grown-up work like math.

"No!" you shouted.

Kelly sighed, "Look, Melanie, you gotta do your homework! I don't want you to fail tomorrow." However, you completely ignored her, stomping your feet in annoyance. "No! I don't wanna!"

Your friend sighed rubbed, already tried of your childish attitude already. So she....
1211221112.title: No!

choices: Quit studying and have fun with Kelly
Continue to study and try to keep Kelly focused
122.content:
"I don't think so," You reply. "I just need to buckle down and focus. I don't need drugs for that."

"Suit yourself," Kelly laughed as she broke a pill in half. "You really need to loosen up, Mel. Try having some fun once in your life and not worry about the consequences."

Kelly popped half of the pill into her mouth and swallowed. She slid the other half of the pill across the table to you. Grabbing her water bottle, she took a big swig to clear the taste out of her mouth.

"What did you just do?" You gasp. "Why on earth would you do that?"

"Relax, Mels-bells," Kelly laughs. "When I need to study extra hard I take half a pill. As far as I can tell, it regresses my mind back to that of a thirteen year-old. At least I think it's my old thirteen year-old mind. Most of junior high and high school is a blur."

You stare down at the other half of the pill. Kelly made a good point, and she has been taking J for quite a while and does not appear to have any side effects. But you had made your decision, and are not going to waffle.

"I'm sorry, but I'm not interested," You say.

"Fine," Kelly answers, as she sticks her tongue out at you. "Then give it back."

You slide the pill back to Kelly. Kelly takes the pill and puts it back into the plastic bag that she kept hidden in her purse.

"Do you want to go to the mall? Or go get pizza? Studying is boring," Kelly said, her words racing. "We don't need to study, let's go have fun."

"Oh great," You mutter, "You're a teenager again."

Kelly just sat across from you and giggled.
122.title: Refuse to try it.

choices: Ask how she plans to prove it.
13.content:
"We're not ready do have children." you tell Beth, your wife, for what feels like the thousandth time.

"You might not be." She insists. "But I am and if I don't soon it will be too late."

"What makes you think you're ready?" You ask. "How do you know you can cope with a baby? Someone completely dependant on you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week."

"I'll prove it." She insists.
13.title: Richard, a 30 year-old married man.

131.content:
"Really?" you ask. "How are you going to prove it?"

"Have you heard about J?" she asks.

"That drug, Juvenile?" you reply. "The one that makes you feel younger?"

"Yes." she says. "It doesn't just make you feel younger. It temporarily regresses your brain."

"What does it have to do with us having a baby?" you ask, not sure you want the answer.

"If you take enough it will make you act just like a baby." She starts "And you have a lot of holiday time saved up at work."

"You want me to be your baby so you can prove that you're ready?" you finally see where she is going.

"Just for a week or two." she says. "Then you'll see what a great mother I'll be."
131.title: Ask how she plans to prove it.

1311.content:
"Okay" you say. The plan sounds crazy but when Beth gives you that look it's too hard to say no.

"Really?" She asks. Then before you can change your mind she hugs you tightly. "Thankyou Richard. I'll start getting things ready and you organise to take next month off work."

So it was decided and the preparations began.

Soon enough it is the last Friday before your holiday. Beth has been redecorating the spare room as a nursery for the new 'baby'. You finish your work for the day and, with some reluctance, shut down your computer and return home to begin your new childhood.

Beth greets you at the front door with a kiss. "So are you ready to start?" she asks excitedly.

"I guess so." you say.

"Good." she takes your hand and almost drags you to the nursery where she starts undressing you. "Let's get you ready then you can take the J"

Soon you are completely naked. She leaves you there and opens a drawer. "Do you want cloth diapers or disposables tonight?"

"Diapers?" you ask. "You want me to wear diapers?"

"You're going to have the mind of a baby." She points out. "You won't know how to use the toilet."
1311.title: Agree to her plan.

13111.content:
"The cloth diapers. So you have to wash them." you decide. "If I have to wear diapers I want it to be a difficult as possible for you."

"Okay honey." She takes out a large terrycloth diaper and folds it on the floor. "Lay down."

You sit on the thick material and lay down. Beth pulls the front up tight between your legs and holds it there while she brings up the sides and pins them in place.

"Up you get." She helps you to stand up again. As you get used to the strange bulk between your legs she returns to the drawers and pulls out a pair of opaque blue plastic pants. She holds them out for you to step into. "These will make sure your diapers don't leak." she explains as she pulls them up over your bottom.

You look at yourself in the mirrored doors of the wardrobe. You look like you are wearing a balloon.

She finishes your outfit with a matching blue t-shirt. "You're adorable." she declares. "Should we have dinner first or are you ready to take the pills now?"
13111.title: Choose the cloth diapers.

131111.content:
You aren't eager to lose your adult self, even temporarily. So despite the fact that you're already dressed like a giant toddler, you opt to put off the mental transformation for now.

"Let's have dinner first." you say. "You'll probably be feeding me baby food for the next few weeks. This is my last chance for a proper meal."

"Okay I'll go get something ready. Come out to the living room" She leads you out of the nursery. "I bought you some toys they are in the box over there." The points next to the TV.
131111.title: Have dinner first.

choices: Avoid the coffee and dig into the pancakes.
1312.content:
"I don't think that trying a trendy drug on me is the best way to test your skills as a mother." You say with concern.

You see a pouty lip develop on Beth's face as she teasingly pinches your cheek. "But you'd make such a cute babyyy." She says in a childish voice.

"Okay." You hear yourself say just as her eyes light up with the mischievous look that made you fall for her in the first place. "Just give me tonight to think about it. I promise you'll have an answer by tomorrow." You say, trying to sound sincere, without revealing that you have no intention of indulging Beth's wish. You kiss her goodnight and are soon fast asleep.

You awake to the smell of freshly cooked bacon, sweet pancakes, and hot coffee. Your mouth salivates before your eyes are able to open. As you start to sit up, you see Beth through blurred, sleepy eyes. She is bringing you breakfast in bed.

"Good morning, Baby!" She say's with a loving smile. "Hungry?"

You nod, groggily as she places a food tray on your lap and sits down next to you on the bed. "Good morning, Beth." You say happily. "What have I done to deserve this?"

"I don't think I need a reason to show my hubby how much I love him." She says as she caresses your hair.

You are taken slightly off your guard by her response but she is being so gentle and you feel too comfortable to consider it any further.

"Eat up, sweety." She says. "You have a big day ahead of you."

You look down at your plate, almost drooling, when you notice an unusual foamy head on the mug of coffee. You notice Beth's eyes fixated, glancing into your eyes and then at the mug, and back again at you.
1312.title: Refuse.

choices: Tell Brad that you're leaving him.
14.content:
"What are you doing in bed with her?" You ask your husband Brad. The question is stupid. It's obvious what he was doing in your bed with his secretary.

"Rachel" Brad says. "I thought you were out with your friends tonight."

You were, but the night ended early when Sarah had received a call from her daughters's babysitter and had to rush home.

"And that's supposed to make this better?" you ask. "That I wasn't meant to know about it?"

"I..." he says. "Um."

Kelly, his 20 year-old secretary looks around nervously, obviously trying to locate her clothes.
14.title: Rachel, a 30 year-old married woman.

142.content:
"This is unforgivable." you say. "I'm leaving you."

You storm out and drive to your friend Janet's house. There you explain what happened and she happily lets you stay with her as long as you need to.

A few days later you receive a call from Brad. "I'm really sorry." He tells you. "I know you're not going to take me back."

"So what do you want?" you ask.

"Just to talk and figure out what is going to happen to the house and everything." he tells you. "I don't want to get lawyers involved, You can take anything you want."

"Okay." you tell him. "Where do you want to meet?"

"Come to the house." he tells you.

Soon you are sitting across the dinning table from him.

"Would you like some coffee?" he asks.
142.title: Tell Brad that you're leaving him.

1421.content:
"Thankyou." you politely accept the offer.

Brad disappears into the kitchen for a few minutes and returns with two mugs of coffee.

He places one in front of you and sits down with his own.

You sip your coffee as you talk until you begin to feel odd, like you don't belong in your own body,

"I'm feeling a bit weird." You tell Brad, standing up. "I think we should discuss this another time."

Your legs begin to feel unsteady and you fall hard on the ground.

You respond the only way that seems suitable. You begin crying loudly.

"My poor baby." Brad comes to you and picks you and puts his arms around you.

"What did you do to her?" A woman comes out of another room, responding to your cries.

You recognise the woman as Kelly. You don't like her. You're not sure why though. It has something to do with her being in bed with Brad but when you think about it you can't figure out why that makes you dislike her.

"I just gave her the drug." Brad tells Kelly. "She got up just as she was starting to regress and fell over."

"Are you okay Rachel?" Kelly asks, reaching out to stroke your hair.
1421.title: Say yes.

14211.content:
You may not understand why but you don't like this woman and you don't want her to touch you so you bite her hand when nit is close enough.

"Ouch." Kelly complains. "The bitch bit me."

"Watch your language." Brad reminds her. "She has the mind of a baby."

"She seems to remember that she doesn't like me." Kelly points out.

"Give it some time." Brad points out. "Eventually she will think of you as her mommy."

"Fine." she says, still rubbing her hand. "But for now you'd better be the one who changes her diapers."

"That reminds me." Brad turns you you. "I'd better get you into a diaper before you have an accident."

He takes you by the hand. You are able to walk, although unsteadily, by using his hand to hold yourself upright.

He takes you down the hall to a room. There is a large pink and white cot is against one wall and next to that is a changing table. Around the rest of the room are a lot of toys.

"This is your room now Rachel." He tells, helping you up onto the changing table and undressing you. "Lay down." he directs you as he collects a large disposable diaper from under the table. "Good girl." he unfolds the diaper and slides it under your bottom then tapes you into it. "Wait here." he leaves you on the table and goes to the wardrobe.
14211.title: Bite Kelly's hand.

choices: Say that you want Brad too.
14212.content:
You can't remember why you don't like Kelly and she's being nice to you so you let her stroke your hair.

It feels nice and you quickly calm down.

"I should get her diapered." Kelly tells Brad. "Before she has an accident."

"Good idea." Brad says. "Do you need any help?"

"No. I think us girls can handle it." She looks at you. "Can't we Rachel?"
14212.title: Let Kelly stroke your hair.

151.content:
A few days ago you had just gotten some J. The guy who sold it tell you was a little concerned saying you are already so young. You didn't care and convinced him to sell. You were hoping to go back to a younger age of maybe around 6 or 7. Back at that age you had felt happy and content. The low stress and lack of worry was wonderful. It was Sunday morning and your mother was going to go shopping for some time. Usually she was gone up to 8 hours when she did major shopping like this. You had decided earlier on this is when you would try some of the J.

A few minutes later your mother leaves after saying your good byes and asking first if you wanted to come. You of course rejected her invitation. Once you were sure she was going you hurriedly went into your room and decided to take some pills. How many do you take?
151.title: Yes.

1512.content:
You gather two pills into your hand and hide the rest. Both pills are placed in your mouth and swallowed with the help of some water you got earlier. Not being sure how long it will take to cause the effects, you sit on your floor and wait. Your thoughts are drifting between school and the pills. Never have you been so excited for something before.


After a while your thoughts begin changing. You start thinking of snacks and young children TV shows. Deciding you want to want some television you happily run out of your room. Approaching the TV you spot the remote. You turn on television with it and begin flipping channels. Flipping through a bunch of boring big kid and adult shows you finally find a your favorite child show! You watch two episodes of it until something else comes on. The show looks like for boring older people. You turn off the television and begin to look for toys to play with.

Remembering where your room is you walk inside. Confusingly there does not seem to be any toys in here. Didn't you have toys? Searching the entire room you don't even find a doll or stuffed animal. "I must have have left my toys somewhere else." you begin to think. Looking around once more you begin to think this might not be your room. You don't have a big kid bed after all! Feeling smart you leave and look in another room for your real room.

You enter a room and recognize it was your mommy's room. "This is not my room but I could have left toys here" you think. Soon you are opening up some drawers looking for toys. You find nothing interesting and decide to leave. The next room you enter is
1512.title: Two

15121.content:
Entering the next you see pink wallpaper and a crib in the corner. In another corner is a table with changing supplies. You recognize this room as your much younger cousin's room who stayed with you for about seven months while your aunt was overseas for work. It had used to be a guest room before that. You spot a toy box though. Perhaps this was actually your room and imagined that cousin stuff? Rushing over to the toybox, you open it, and pull out some toys. These toys are awesome! This must be your room! That cousin stuff you imagined is just sill you do not have a cousin.

You grab some toys and sit on the floor. You play for a while and need to use the potty now. What will you do?
15121.title: guest room(turned toddler room)

1513.content: Very soon after taking them your entire mind goes blank. No thoughts or anything. Your mother finds you hours later staring off into space. She speaks with you but recieves no response. She leaves and comes back later and begins to become worried when she spots you in the same position. It eventually ends with her rushing you to the hospital. All the doctors are able to find is you took too much J especially for your age and fried your mind completely and leave the effects permanent.
1513.title: 3 might work

info.brief_description: A new drug causes temporary mental regression. Users may experience permanent side-effects
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please check this subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DiaperedRoleplay/

A new drug has hat the streets. People are calling it Juvenile or just J. It temporarily returns the user's mind to a more youthful state.

Its most popular use is recreation. Some want to experience being a teenager again when just being near someone of the opposite sex was exciting and taking risks was normal. Others return to childhood where everything is new and there's no responsibility. A much smaller group even regress their minds to when they were toddlers or even infants.

A growing number of people have also discovered its use for study. A youthful mind absorbs information much better than a fully matured one. Unfortunately self-discipline also decreases with age. To deal with this, some people ask a friend to act as their 'parent' and keep them focused on study.

Due to the illegality of the drug there is little quality control and it is hard to know exactly what dosage you are getting. Some people have found themselves regressed to infancy when they were aiming for teenage. More concerning, there are rumors of people suffering permanent side-effects. Some have returned from a trip to infancy still incontinent. Others have not returned.

After the first "character selection" choice this story should be written in the style of a "choose your own adventure" type book. That means keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story is referred to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices that character can make, not events outside his/her control. Eg "How much J will you take? 1) 1 pill 2) 2 pills" is good but "How far do the pills regress you? 1) Childhood 2) Infancy." is not.
